DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select§§n X.FiscalDate,§§n UserName,§§n LoginEmail,§§n X.[User],§§n Sum(X.SessionMinutes) as SessionMinutes,§§n Sum(X.ProductCount) as ProductCount,§§n Sum(X.TransactionCount) as TransactionCount,§§n Sum(X.TotalSelectionTimeSecs) as TotalSelectionTimeSecs,§§n Sum(X.TotalPaymentTimeSecs) as TotalPaymentTimeSecs,§§n Sum(X.TotalPrintTimeSecs) as TotalPrintTimeSecs,§§n Sum(X.TotalSelectionTimeSecs + X.TotalPaymentTimeSecs + X.TotalPrintTimeSecs) as TotalTransactionTimeSecs§§nfrom (§§n select§§n UA.FiscalDate,§§n DateDiff(minute, UA.LoginDateTime, UA.LogoutDateTime) as SessionMinutes,§§n UA.ProductCount,§§n UA.TransactionCount,§§n Cast(UA.TotalSelectionTime as float)/10 as [TotalSelectionTimeSecs],§§n Cast(UA.TotalPaymentTime as float)/10 as [TotalPaymentTimeSecs],§§n Cast(UA.TotalPrintTime as float)/10 as [TotalPrintTimeSecs],§§n UsrLogin.UserName,§§n A.DisplayName as [User],§§n UsrEmail.UserName as [LoginEmail]§§n from§§n tbUserActivity UA left join§§n tbAccount A on A.AccountId=UA.UserAccountId left join§§n tbWorkstation W on UA.WorkstationId=W.WorkstationId left join§§n tbAccount OPA on OPA.AccountId=W.OpAreaAccountId left join§§n tbAccount Loc on Loc.AccountId=W.LocationAccountId left join§§n tbLoginAlias UsrLogin on UsrLogin.AccountId=A.AccountId and UsrLogin.LoginAliasType=0 left join§§n tbLoginAlias UsrEmail on UsrEmail.AccountId=A.AccountId and UsrEmail.LoginAliasType=1§§n where§§n UA.FiscalDate>=:@DateFrom and§§n UA.FiscalDate<=:@DateTo and§§n (:@WorkstationId is null or W.WorkstationId=:@WorkstationId) and§§n (:@OpAreaId is null or W.OpAreaAccountId=:@OpAreaId) and§§n (:@LocationId is null or W.LocationAccountId=:@LocationId) and§§n (:@UserId is null or UA.UserAccountId=:@UserId)§§n) X§§ngroup by§§n X.FiscalDate,§§n UserName,§§n X.[User],§§n LoginEmail§§n
